name: Free Hamster
description:
Free Hamster is a speed game, the objective is to help our dear friend the hamster to free himself from the grip of his “ball”. For this you will have to accumulate enough speed while dodging the elements of the scenery to hit the wall and open his prison, but be careful not to go too fast at the risk of finding a magnificent hamster pancake !!

This game is playable with mouse or xBox controllers but we recommend the joystick which is more pleasant
